Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix ANN model loading in Railway deployment

- Enable ANN model preloading on startup for better UX
- Add detailed error logging to diagnose model loading issues
- Fix .gitignore excluding model files and data from deployment
- Allow *.pth, *.csv, and data/ directories to be included in deployment

The previous .gitignore was preventing the ANN model files and NBA data
from being deployed to Railway, causing "Model not loaded" errors in the
frontend.
